item.title: How to make your Instagram post stand out?
item.description: Choose a photo and click “More” on sticker page Go to “Free” section and find “Shape Stickers 2” Add the transparent frame to make a shadow effect! Use “Clip” tool to add any photos you want to crop and add in! *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}▶" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;" allowfullscreen title="
